scene.title: 戦闘3
scene.text: Because of this, when the three of them faced the strange girl in front of them, they didn’t even look down on her.
scene.dialog: [The enemy is the enemy. There is no distinction between men and women, old or young, only you. Anyone can take your life. Treat the target as the last opponent in your life and use all means to kill them.]
scene.text: Therefore, the three of them didn’t panic at all when they saw that their companion was knocked out.

motion.img: 老鹰-普通-抱胸有刀-远景

scene.dialog: [You must protect your companions on the battlefield, but fallen companions are not comrades in arms, but burdens. Don’t treat them as standing people. Only soldiers who know when to give them up can live longer.]
scene.text: Similarly, the three of them didn’t hesitate after seeing Sushang had kicked up a sand storm into the sky.
scene.dialog: [Follow my plan, and everything will be fine.]
scene.text: After all, for five years, "Eagle"’s instructions have never been wrong.

mono.p: The three quickly closed their eyes.
Compared with the loss of vision, the pain and conditioned reflexes caused by sand in the eyes were more dangerous.
The moment they closed their eyes, the three had already memorized each other's and the enemy's location.
The steps they took next and the direction of their swords strictly followed the “Cormorant Wings Formation”.
The bandit in the center took the lead with a greatsword, launching a heavy strike from above.
The bandit on the left took a step, slashed horizontally, and attacked the target’s lower half.
The intention of these two swords was not to kill the enemy, but to bait the enemy.
"Eagle" carefully designed formations and swordsmanship to guide the enemy to dodge according to a pre-established route.
If the target can dodge these two blades, then she must be in the pre-calculated position at this moment.
At this time, it was the turn of the bandit on the right to execute a mortal blow.
They're confident that even if they couldn’t see the enemy, they could kill the enemy with this three-man formation!
There was nothing wrong with the formation, but the Sands bandits underestimated Sushang.
As soon as the sand specks flew up, Sushang had already sprung forward.
Just as the Sand bandits were convinced of Eagle's formation, she also had absolute confidence in her martial arts.
With a clear Blade Heart, she didn’t feel that the slow sword technique of the big man was necessary to dodge.
When the middle swordsman raised the greatsword, the girl was already within arms reach.
Before he even had time to react, he received a heavy blow on the lower jaw.
The impact passed through his skull directly to the brain. The violent concussion immediately made him faint.
Therefore, the swordsman failed to feel the heavy kick that hit his knee afterwards, and collapsed to the ground.
With the help of a kick, Sushang made a beautiful "Swallow’s Return", and in a flash, she landed behind the big man on the left.
She hit the back of the big man with her palm,

scene.mono: grabbed the sword with the other hand, and threw it at the last enemy.

mono.p: In an instant, she calculated the strength and speed to the right, and put it into action correctly.
The "Blade Mantra" of Taixuan’s Five Essences
It was just such a profound mental method that maximizes the potential of the brain.

remark.p: It was one of the parts that made up swords.
The core of the sword was a kensen (sword spinal cord) at its center, and on either side were two sides.
Sword spinal cord and sword back are combined to form a kenja.

scene.text: Sushang accurately hit the man's abdominal cavity with the sword, the sudden pain made him open his mouth and let out a short hiss.
At this moment, the world was spinning, and the sense of balance disappeared instantly.
Something hot was on his right cheek and it was too hot for him to bear.
The man opened his eyes and saw the hot sand that was almost jet black.
It turned out that something was not pressing against his cheeks, but his face was pressed tightly against the ground.
scene.dialog: [...You guys are a little bit scarce.]
scene.text: Sushang sat on his back, tapping the back of his head with her slender fingers:
scene.dialog: [Why are there only four of you? Where did the others go?]
scene.text: Her voice was clear and crisp, very nice, like an innocent girl.
